Initiates of the hidden world use spintriae to pay for services. They can easily be sold for more traditional funds. Iron spintriae are the lowest denomination, and display scenes of murder on their reverse side.
Initiates of the hidden world use spintriae to pay for services. They can easily be sold for more traditional funds. Bronze spintriae usually display the act of shaping on their reverse side.

My intellect should be put to better use! But the pay is better than labourer's work.
